attributes.action: Provide continuing education for all drivers in the form of short information films.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These information films should be shown on as many TV channels as possible - BBC and commercially funded. Ideally they should demonstrate the correct procedures and the consequences of failing to use the those procedures. Initial areas to be addressed could include behaviour on roundabouts (which lane to be in and when to indicate), lighting regulations etc.
